servicesdescription: Different examples of projects that I can help you build.
card1text3: Simple front-end using CMS like Wordpress ou Wix.
card2text3: For a responsive personalized front-end in ReactJs or NextJs.

projectdescription: Few examples of projects I've work on.
project1work: Website for a mental and sport coach.
project1details: Build with Wordpress, this work has a blog and a subscription on a mailing list for a news letter using MailChimp. The Theme was customized with CSS.
project2work: Website for a holiday house renting activity.
project2details: Showcase, front-end created with Reactjs and Bootstrap, hosted on Vercel. Responsive website realised with custom CSS. French and english translation with i18next.
project3work: Website for the artist Laurence Poidatz
project3details: Showcase website updated on wix.com, and reworked to be responsive.
project4work: Website for the art organization: le salon des arts de Carantec.
project4details: Showcase website with front-end created with Reactjs and Bootstrap, hosted on Vercel. Responsive website with custom CSS. A printable pdf form was created without saving data using react-to-print. French and english translation i18next.
project5work: Demo for a e-learning website with online payments.
project5details: Website with front-end in Reactjs and Bootstrap, back-end with an api created with Ruby On Rails and a database in postgreSQL. Website hosted on Heroku. Responsive website in Bootstrap and custom CSS. Authentication with Devise and user management. 3 different users, students, teachers and administrators. Online payments with Stripe.
